001package org.consensusj.rx.zeromq;
002
003import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.BackpressureStrategy;
004import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Flowable;
005import io.reactivex.rxjava3.disposables.Disposable;
006import io.reactivex.rxjava3.processors.FlowableProcessor;
007import io.reactivex.rxjava3.processors.PublishProcessor;
008import org.reactivestreams.Publisher;
009import org.reactivestreams.Subscriber;
010import org.slf4j.Logger;
011import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
012import org.zeromq.SocketType;
013import org.zeromq.ZContext;
014import org.zeromq.ZMQ;
015import org.zeromq.ZMsg;
016
017import java.io.Closeable;
018import java.net.URI;
019import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
020import java.util.List;
021import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap;
022import java.util.concurrent.ThreadFactory;
023
024/**
025 * ZMQ Context with a single socket and one {@code Processor<ZMsg>} per topic.
026 * It subscribes {@code SUB} to one or more topics using ZMQ and receives a multiplexed
027 * stream of {@link ZMsg} from the {@link ZMsgSocketFlowable}. In {@link RxZmqContext#onNext} the {@code ZMsg}
028 * are de-multiplexed by the {@code topic} {@code String} and placed in a per-topic
029 * {@code Processor<ZMsg>}.
030 * <p>
031 * Topics (at least for now) must be passed to the constructor.
032 * It would be nice to be able to subscribe to topics at the ZMQ level when we first get
033 * subscriptions at the Rx level. This will probably require using a ZPoller or something like that.
034 */
035public class RxZmqContext implements Closeable {
036    private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(RxZmqContext.class);
037    private final ZContext zContext;
038    private final Disposable disposable;
039
040    // Map of topic names to per-topic Processor
041    private final ConcurrentHashMap<String, FlowableProcessor<ZMsg>> processors = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
042
043    public RxZmqContext(URI tcpAddress, List<String> topics) {
044        this(tcpAddress, topics, (Runnable r) -> new Thread(r, "ZeroMQ Subscriber"));
045    }
046
047    /**
048     * @param tcpAddress Address of ZMQ server to connect to
049     * @param topics a list of topics to subscribe to
050     * @param threadFactory factory to create a thread for the receive loop (see {@link ZMsgSocketFlowable#createFromSocket(ZMQ.Socket, ThreadFactory)})
051     */
052    public RxZmqContext(URI tcpAddress, List<String> topics, ThreadFactory threadFactory) {
053        zContext = new ZContext();
054        //  Socket to talk to server
055        log.info("Connecting to Zmq server at: {}", tcpAddress);
056
057        ZMQ.Socket socket = zContext.createSocket(SocketType.SUB);
058        socket.connect(tcpAddress.toString());
059
060        topics.forEach(topic -> {
061            log.info("Subscribing to topic: {}", topic);
062            this.addTopic(topic);
063            socket.subscribe(topic);
064        });
065
066        disposable = Flowable.fromPublisher(ZMsgSocketFlowable.createFromSocket(socket, threadFactory))
067                .subscribe(this::onNext, this::onError, this::onComplete);
068        log.info("Connected.. Waiting for subscribers.");
069    }
070
071    /**
072     * Get a Publisher (internally is an RxJava3 Flowable) for a given topic
073     *
074     * @param topic a valid topic as passed to the constructor
075     * @return A Publisher for the topic
076     * @throws IllegalArgumentException if topic wasn't configured in the constructor
077     */
078    public Publisher<ZMsg> topicPublisher(String topic) {
079        Publisher<ZMsg> publisher = processors.get(topic);
080        if (publisher == null) {
081            throw new IllegalArgumentException("topic unavailable -- topics must be passed to constructor");
082        }
083        return publisher;
084    }
085
086    @Override
087    public void close() {
088        disposable.dispose();
089        zContext.close();
090    }
091
092    private void onNext(ZMsg zMsg) {
093        // Deliver message to correct processor for topic
094        String topic = zMsg.getFirst().getString(StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
095        Subscriber<ZMsg> subscriber = processors.get(topic);
096        subscriber.onNext(zMsg);
097    }
098
099    private void onError(Throwable throwable) {
100        // Propagate upstream onError to all downstream
101        processors.values().forEach(p -> p.onError(throwable));
102    }
103
104    private void onComplete() {
105        // Propagate upstream onComplete to all downstream
106        processors.values().forEach(Subscriber::onComplete);
107    }
108
109    private void addTopic(String topic) {
110        processors.computeIfAbsent(topic, keyTopic -> PublishProcessor.create());
111    }
112}
